name: MSCRMShareFlow
description: Shares a Flow with users and/or groups
author: Wael Hamze
helpMarkDown: For more information visit the task [docs](https://github.com/WaelHamze/dyn365-ce-vsts-tasks/blob/master/Docs/MSCRMShareFlow/Overview.md).

inputs.name: shareType
inputs.label: Share Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select Basic to share a single Flow with a single principal or Advanced to share mutiple Flows with mutiple principals via a json configuration file

inputs.name: flowName
inputs.label: Flow Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Flow you want to share. Note this is not the display name.

inputs.name: principalType
inputs.label: Principal Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select if you want to share the Flow with a specific user or a group

inputs.name: principal
inputs.label: Principal
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the group (e.g. 'Sales Team') or user login (e.g. 'user@domain.com')

inputs.name: roleName
inputs.label: Permissions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the permissions you want to provide when sharing the App

inputs.name: shareConfigFile
inputs.label: Sharing Configuration File (json)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The absolute path to the json configuration file on the agent machine. Sample configuration [file](https://github.com/WaelHamze/xrm-ci-framework/blob/master/MSDYNV9/Xrm.Framework.CI/Xrm.Framework.CI.PowerShell.Scripts/ShareFlows.json).
